snippet: President Obama's campaign continued on Saturday to prosecute its case against Mitt Romney for holding offshore accounts, releasing a new television ad that mockingly shows the Republican candidate singing "America the Beautiful."
abstract: President Obama's campaign continued on Saturday to prosecute its case against Mitt Romney for holding offshore accounts, releasing a new television ad that mockingly shows the Republican candidate singing "America the Beautiful."

headline.main: Obama Ad Continues Effort to Tie Romney to Outsourcing
